Performer:
Toyozawa Tomisuke V (see also Nozawa Katsushi) (豊澤富助 (五))

Alternate Name: Nozawa Katsushi (野澤勝司)

Dates: '1984/04-'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)
